flawed_nl_solution:
Half the pet-owners have a cat because 1 - 1/2 = 2
There are 15 pet owners because 30 / (2) = <<30/(2)=15>>15
The town has 25 citizens because 15 / 0.6 = <<15/0.6=25>>25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/2, not 2. It appears the numerator and denominator were swapped.
